articles.author: Rounak Jain
articles.title: Asus 8z review – the 'mini' flagship phone that the Android world needs - Business Insider India
articles.description: The Asus 8z is a flagship smartphone that offers a stock Android experience. The main highlight of the device is its compact form factor. Despite its compact
articles.content: The Asus 8z landed in India after a delay of several months. It was launched as the Zenfone 8 globally in May last year. Powered by a flagship Qualcomm chipset, the Asus 8z comes in a compact avatar,… [+4758 chars]
